decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-06ffcba1-7fff-dbae-15c9-5aec5beb3caf"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposed rear dormer extension, by reason of its detailed design, size, bulk, and location would result in an overly large and incongruous addition that would be out of keeping with the host building and the terrace it forms part of. As such the proposed development is contrary to policy D4 (Delivering good design) of the London Plan 2021, policy LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) of the LP33 Hackney Local Plan (2020), and the guidance contained within Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD 2009.</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d31cbb1a-7fff-915d-60be-5ab1cc94b79f"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposed roof extension by reason of its detailed design, scale, siting, and materials, would be out of character with the host property, and the terrace it forms part of and harmful to the wider streetscene. It would therefore be contrary to Policy LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) of the Hackney Local Plan 2033, policy D4 (Delivering good design) of the London Plan, and the Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD 2009.</span></span><br></p>
description: Erection of a rear roof extension and construction of roof terrace above two storey outrigger roof and two front roof lights.
